publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-529 Iain Gray: Beautiful Scotland Awardsâ€”That the Parliament notes the announcement of the 2007 Beautiful Scotland awards, run by Keep Scotland Beautiful; welcomes the recognition which the awards provide to communities that work to enhance their local areas; applauds all the entrants for their efforts to promote litter-free environments, encourage recycling and increase tourism, and congratulates North Berwick on winning the prestigious Rosebowl Trophy, the Best Coastal Resort Award and the VisitScotland Award for Tourism.
S3M-529 Beautiful Scotland Awards (lodged on 21 September 2007) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-529 Beautiful Scotland Awards (lodged on 21 September 2007) Christine Grahame*
